name: Scrap Goblin
effectText: Cannot be destroyed by battle. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this face-up Defense Position card is targeted for an attack: Destroy this card. If this card is destroyed by the effect of a "Scrap" card and sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Scrap" monster in your GY, except "Scrap Goblin"; add that target to your hand.
